detaileddescription.para: This class implements a simple one breakpoint, non-linear reed function, as described by Smith (1986). This function is based on a memoryless non-linear spring model of the reed (the reed mass is ignored) which saturates when the reed collides with the mouthpiece facing.
See McIntyre, Schumacher, & Woodhouse (1983), Smith (1986), Hirschman, Cook, Scavone, and others for more information.
by Perry R. Cook and Gary P. Scavone, 1995 - 2005.
